answers.answer: Exact same thing happened to me! Lol Good news is it's not the end of the world having to supplement your iron!  :) good luck to you momma!

question: Good news 1 hour diabetes test came back good bad news is I am anemic :/Hello iron pills. I was really hoping that this wouldn't happen with this pregnancy but it's all good:)April 11th is approaching fast and I am nervous
title: good and bad news
